extension.description:
!!! Important !!! Whenever you change the configuration of this addon you have to disable and enable it again for the changes to take effect.
To quickly add this client to the android-app you can launch/run this addon from the programs-list to display a QR-Code which than can be scanned via the official app.
Features (so far): - Display a QR-Code for easy setup - Display notifications of your phone right in Kodi - On incoming-/outgoing calls pause or mute the playback or simply lower the volume
